name: claude-ai-engineering
description: AI Engineering toolkit with Claude Code plugins for learning, project analysis, and multi-agent workflows

plugins.name: learning-summary
plugins.description: Capture and document key learnings from conversations with structured markdown output

plugins.name: project-insight
plugins.description: Comprehensive project analysis using multi-agent insights pipeline

plugins.name: ai-digest
plugins.description: Digest AI/tech articles and content into structured learning documents

plugins.name: spec-interview
plugins.description: AI-driven requirements gathering through in-depth interviews to create comprehensive specifications

plugins.name: ai-news-digest
plugins.description: Aggregates latest AI news from multiple RSS sources and generates curated Top 5 digest on-demand

plugins.name: market-pulse
plugins.description: Financial market analysis dashboard with US stocks, Korean stocks, global macro, and crypto insights
